entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
